ygData.subject: Re: Pls explain AC
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings all, I found that the low weight ac thing was not really an issue till I got to 12th lvl then I slowly started taking off my leather armor and
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings all,

I found that the low weight ac thing was not really an
issue till I got to 12th lvl then I slowly started
taking off my leather armor and replacing it with
lighter components here and there.

At lvl 18 I still carry some heavy stuff with me...
though my weight without stars and bandages is 14
now... I am still after one more Mesh bracer... a
lighter cloak some lighter shoulder pads... though I
have a great weight as it is

I found though that from 12th up it started making a
difference... not much at first but slowly ever lvl
the bonus for low weight was more and more...

I wish you all well
Lenyong
Bertoxxulous server
